Name: Hop Toad #1
Ingredients: 30 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
30 ml De Kuyper Apricot Brandy liqueur
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Review: Resembles an apricot Daiquiri that's heavy on the lime yet balanced.
Nutrition: One serving of Hop Toad #1 contains 134 calories
